name: Bloodscape EARLY DEMO/BETA
description: An early DEMO/BETA for my first game Bloodscape only 2 towns work the small one and the abandoned one. There are no NPCs nor any quests and story but the story is about you and your friends going to an Island that has 4 separated states and you have to try to join them together I honestly do not know I really have no life like instead of focusing in school and doing my homework I'm wasting my time making this stupid game so yea hope you enjoy
